arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)
	
	local NPC_Entrance = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Class_Sorc_Cellar_NPC_01")[1]
	--Hydra.TraceScreen("NPC_Entrance: ", NPC_Entrance)
	local marker01 = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Class_Sorc_Cellar_Marker_01")[1]
	--Hydra.TraceScreen("marker01: ", marker01)
	local marker02 = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Class_Sorc_Cellar_Marker_02")[1]
	--Hydra.TraceScreen("marker02: ", marker02)
	
	
	
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convCellar_01, NPC_Entrance)
	
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(NPC_Entrance, marker01, "NPC_Walk_Fast", false)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(NPC_Entrance, marker02, "NPC_Walk_Fast", false)	
	Hydra.QActorSheath(NPC_Entrance)
	Hydra.QActorPlayEffectGroup(NPC_Entrance, "NPC_Routine_Read_EG", true)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(NPC_Entrance, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Write_WaistLevel")
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	--red flame
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXRed, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable", true)
	--smoke 
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXRed, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust", true)
	--NPC bark
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convCellarRed, idActorPlayer)

	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	--blue flame
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXBlue, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_blue", true)
	--smoke 
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXBlue, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust", true)
	--NPC bark
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convCellarBlue, idActorPlayer)

	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	--green flame
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXGreen, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_green", true)
	--smoke 
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXGreen, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust", true)
	--NPC bark
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convCellarGreen, idActorPlayer)
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)	
	--yellow flame
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXYellow, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_mystic", true)
	--smoke 
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXYellow, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust", true)
	--NPC bark
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convCellarYellow, idActorPlayer)
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
	--douse the nice lights
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXRed, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXRed, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust")
	
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXBlue, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_blue")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXBlue, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust")	
	
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXGreen, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_green")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXGreen, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust")	
	
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXYellow, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_mystic")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXYellow, "interactiveVFX_destructible_dust")		
	
	--clear the nice FX
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXRed, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXBlue, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXGreen, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXYellow, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits")

	--light the bad lights
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXRed, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXBlue, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXGreen, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerFXYellow, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier", true)
	
	--play the bad fx
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXRed, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXBlue, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXGreen, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic", true)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXYellow, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic", true)
	
	--activate smokers
	for i, smoker in ipairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup(groupSmoke)) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(smoker, true);
	end
	
	--dramatic pause
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	
	--start "oh no" convo
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convRitual_02, idActorPlayer)
	
	--queue animations and unsheathe
	Hydra.QActorAnimLoop(idActorNPC, "AnimKey_Backpedal", 3)
	Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idActorNPC, "AnimKey_Panic", 3)
	Hydra.QActorUnsheath(idActorNPC)
	
	--wait for "oh no" convo
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convRitual_02)
	
	--activate spawners
	for i, spawner in ipairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup(groupSpawners)) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(spawner)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	--wait for the "is that wise" to start walking
	Hydra.QActorWait(idActorNPC, 10)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idActorNPC)
	Hydra.QActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idActorNPC, "NPC_Routine_Read_EG")
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idActorNPC, markerSorcWalk1, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idActorNPC, markerSorcWalk1)
	
	--wait for the chant line to start the ritual anim / fx
	Hydra.QActorWait(idActorNPC, 2)
	
	--do the ritual anim / fx
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idActorNPC, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Chant_Ritual_EyeLevel")
	Hydra.QActorEventSend(idActorNPC, "QST_Sorc_Room_FX")
	Hydra.QActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorNPC, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_spirits_medium", true)
	
	--wait for dialogue, then clear ritual animset / fx
	Hydra.QActorWait(idActorNPC, 8)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idActorNPC)
	Hydra.QActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idActorNPC, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_spirits_medium")
	
		
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(markerRoomFXRed, 3.0)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXRed, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits", true)
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(markerRoomFXBlue, 3.0)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXBlue, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits", true)	
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(markerRoomFXGreen, 3.0)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXGreen, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits", true)		
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(markerRoomFXYellow, 3.0)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(markerRoomFXYellow, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_spirits", true)	
end

function Start(idActorKiller, snoMonsterFamily, szArchetype, idActorVictim)
end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
local spawners = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Class_Sorc_Cellar_Spawner")

--douse the bad lights
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXRed, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXBlue, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXGreen, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerFXYellow, "environmentVFX_fire_source_hellBrazier")

--clear the bad fx
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXRed, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXBlue, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXGreen, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic")
Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(markerRoomFXYellow, "fxKit_harmless_persistentCylindrical_demonic")

--turn off spawners
for i, spawner in ipairs(spawners) do
	Hydra.ActorDisable(spawner)
end

--kill any remaining demons
for i, demon in ipairs(Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Class_Sorc_Demons")) do
	Hydra.ActorKill(demon)
end
Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()
